welcome_message_body: Welcome to Seoul, a city known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: DAOL (다올 숮불구이)
restaurants.description: DAOL (다올 숮불구이) is a korean bbq restaurant located in 서울특별시.

restaurants.name: PANET (파네트)
restaurants.description: PANET (파네트) is a bakery located in 서울특별시.

restaurants.name: MOTHER IN LAW BAGELS (마더린러베이글)
restaurants.description: MOTHER IN LAW BAGELS (마더린러베이글) is a bagel shop located in 서울특별시.

restaurants.name: Gimgane (김가네)
restaurants.description: Gimgane (김가네) is a bunsik restaurant located in 서울특별시.

restaurants.name: 을밀대
restaurants.description: 을밀대 is a noodle restaurant located in 서울특별시.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gimpo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Gimpo Airport, dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to log in.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suwon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Suwon Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by entering their flight information.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Incheon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Incheon Airport, exclusively for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
